main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Rock Hill, South Carolina on July 14, 1962, where the object crossed the moon in about 6 seconds.
interesting points: The observer used a 30x telescope to view the object,The object was silver in color and moved from southeast to southwest,The sighting lasted only 6 seconds,There is uncertainty about the nature of the object, as it was labeled potentially as a balloon, astronomical, or aircraft,The absence of photographs in the report raises questions about visual documentation.
witness description: Details about the witness are not provided in the report.
